text: Hey Twitterverse!  👋  Riley here, 20-year-old pancake enthusiast & accidental philosopher.  Expect sarcasm, questionable life choices, & maybe some existential dread disguised as witty tweets.  Excited to be here!  Let's game (and maybe eat some pancakes). 🥞🎮

Ugh, trying to figure out this whole "adulting" thing is harder than mastering Unreal Engine's blueprints.  Seriously,  Godot's simpler, but life... not so much.  Pancake break needed.  #ExistentialPancakeCrisis #AdultingIsHard

Ugh, just finished God of War Ragnarok.  Feeling all the feels,  but mostly just exhausted.  Kinda like my own life, tbh.  Lots of boss battles (internal ones, mostly) and zero clue where I'm going next.  At least Kratos has a beard.  #ExistentialPancakeCrisis #NeedMorePancakes
